title: The one thing I was deeply sad to see not return with new Summoner rift VU
body: I really liked the submerged bodies  in the river but was sad to see it was taken away in the rift vu and not replaced with at least a splash when they fell in battle  it was just one of the odd little things I liked about the rift but was very disappointed when I saw the neat new graphics but no update to the actual body of water aspect {{champion:22}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:67}}  were just a few of my favorites to see die in the river

replies.body: I'm sure you'd have to have payed much attention to the death animations in the river it was something so small yet something so neat in my opinion

cool, though the new map has small things in it too. There's a dear that pokes its head out at the start of the game by bottom blue buff, and you can see gromp in frog form hopping around before first spawn in certain places.
I never got to see this as I started playing after. Sounds like it was cool.
i miss the discarded champions in the Halloween Rift
